description: Creates a user import job. You can import users into user pools from a comma-separated values (CSV) file without adding Amazon Cognito MAU costs to your Amazon Web Services bill.

parameters.name: JobName
parameters.description: A friendly name for the user import job.

parameters.name: UserPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the user pool that you want to import users into.

parameters.name: CloudWatchLogsRoleArn
parameters.description: You must specify an IAM role that has permission to log import-job results to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. This parameter is the ARN of that role.

nested_items.name: UserImportJob
nested_items.description: The details of the user import job. Includes logging destination, status, and the Amazon S3 pre-signed URL for CSV upload.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the user import job.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user import job.

nested_items.name: UserPoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user pool that the users are being imported into.

nested_items.name: PreSignedUrl
nested_items.description: The pre-signed URL target for uploading the CSV file.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the item was created. Amazon Cognito returns this timestamp in UNIX epoch time format. Your SDK might render the output in a human-readable format like ISO 8601 or a Java Date object.

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The date when the user import job was started.

nested_items.name: CompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date when the user import job was completed.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the user import job. One of the following:
Created - The job was created but not started.
Pending - A transition state. You have started the job, but it has not begun importing users yet.
InProgress - The job has started, and users are being imported.
Stopping - You have stopped the job, but the job has not stopped importing users yet.
Stopped - You have stopped the job, and the job has stopped importing users.
Succeeded - The job has completed successfully.
Failed - The job has stopped due to an error.
Expired - You created a job, but did not start the job within 24-48 hours. All data associated with the job was deleted, and the job can't be started.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsRoleArn
nested_items.description: The role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon CloudWatch Logging role for the user import job. For more information, see 'Creating the CloudWatch Logs IAM Role' in the Amazon Cognito Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: ImportedUsers
nested_items.description: The number of users that were successfully imported.

nested_items.name: SkippedUsers
nested_items.description: The number of users that were skipped.

nested_items.name: FailedUsers
nested_items.description: The number of users that couldn't be imported.

nested_items.name: CompletionMessage
nested_items.description: The message returned when the user import job is completed.
